CustomField.formula: IF(!ISNULL(Annual_Revenue__c) , IF( Annual_Revenue__c <= 10000, IMAGE("/img/samples/color_red.gif", "red", 30, 30), IF( AND(Annual_Revenue__c > 10000, Annual_Revenue__c <= 30000) , IMAGE("/img/samples/color_yellow.gif", "yellow", 30, 30), IF(Annual_Revenue__c > 30000, IMAGE("/img/samples/color_green.gif", "green", 30, 30), IMAGE("/img/samples/color_blue.gif", "blue", 30, 30)))),IMAGE("/img/samples/color_blue.gif", "blue", 30, 30))
CustomField.label: Colour Revenue
